General.Name: Abko Co. Ltd
General.Description: ABKO Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells computer peripherals, household appliances, and gaming supplies in South Korea and internationally. It offers PC cases, headsets, keyboards, mouse, mouse pads, CPU coolers, power supply units, cordless bathroom cleaners, electric callus removers, silicone facial cleansing brushes, true wireless stereos, LED cordless motion sensor lights, LED desk and monitor lamps, cordless massage guns, gaming headsets, and gaming chairs. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
